name: ITLibArtwork
desc: This class represents the artwork for a media item.

items.name: var imageData: Data?
items.desc: The raw image data of the artwork in the format that imageDataFormat specifies.

items.name: var imageDataFormat: ITLibArtworkFormat
items.desc: The format of the artwork image data that imageData returns.

items.name: enum ITLibArtworkFormat
items.desc: These constants specify the possible formats of the data that imageDataFormat returns.
